lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Pirates have bolstered their 2017 prospects by signing starting pitcher Ivan Nova to a new three-year deal, the Major League Baseball team announced on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Right-Hander Nova Inks Three-Year Deal With Pirates
headline.main: Right-Hander Nova Inks Three-Year Deal With Pirates

snippet: The Pittsburgh Pirates have bolstered their 2017 prospects by signing starting pitcher Ivan Nova to a new three-year deal, the Major League Baseball team announced on Tuesday....
